Name: GoldfishFlap
About the game: 'You Got Caught On the Fishing Line!' A goldfish wandering along the river was caught on a fishing line! You'll have to be a goldfish and help go home! But Goldfish Are Still Hung On the Fishing Line. Resisting the manpower of the fishing line, let's pass through various topography and go home! My Family is Waiting At Home! It will Be Hard But Worthwhile! You can control flapping goldfish with your mouse! Adventure the sea! There are now 3 kinds of area(more area will be updated!) Avoid the jellyfish and other predator-fishes(even meteoric stones under the sea) ! Sea Is Dangerous Place So It Can Suffer You..! But Don't Give Up You Can Do It! How to play Control with mouse dragging! Die and keep trying If you clear game try it to clear game in shorter time! You will be best of the sea!
